New Records: White Sox's 107th loss on the season, breaking the franchise record set by the 1970 team
Key Match Events: Garrett Crochet struck out eight batters, including an AL record-tying seven straight to start the game
Post-Match Reflections: The loss officially makes this disastrous season historic and the franchise will have major decisions to make following the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two hits mustered came from Gavin Sheets and Miguel Vargas, neither of which resulted in anything beyond a single
